sequence:
The Melancholy of a Princess Chevalier

<size=45>Chapter 7 - Le Triomphant of Iris Libre</size>

scripts.say: After seeing off Forbin and Le Mars...
Commander, I think... I understand what I have to do now.
Up until now, I've always been trapped by my memories of the past, afraid of opening old wounds.
I've decided that I won't run from my past anymore...
But I can't do that as I am now.
Le Triomphant made a fist, gentle but filled with determination.
As Forbin said, I can't just keep my emotions bottled up.
No matter what it takes, I have to make my sisters understand my feelings.
Perhaps my sisters would get angry at me, but even then...
I... I want to get along with my sisters again!
Thank you so much, Commander. This is only possible because of you...
I won't get jealous of others anymore... because surely, I'll be able to have fun with my own sisters again.
From now on, I won't run away from what needs to be done. As my name suggests, I'll be triumphant in reforging my relationship with my sisters!

options.content: You are still cute, though, even if you do decide to run.

scripts.say: Upon hearing my words, Le Triomphant turned a deep shade of red.
Wh-what are you saying? C-calling me c-cute...
Uuu... F-fine... Then, the next time I'm worried about something, you'd better be there to hear me out...
Since you're the person I trust the most, you won't mind if I rely on you a bit more, right?
